name: G-Max Terror
effect: The Ghost-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Phantasm while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves. Deals the base move's damage + 2 to a single enemy. Additionally, blocks the opponent.
description: The user screams and starles the foe, taunting it at the same time with a mean look. The foe can't help but feel chilled to the bone.
